title: Sick, Sad World
description: Stories of the strange, sick, and macabre. Includes the features G-String Grandmas, De-classified Government Polaroids, Neo-Natal Skinheads, Homicidal House Plants, Orca in the Court, The Immaculate Confection, and more!
quote: Can monkeys surf the net and corrupt our kids? Chimpanzee chatrooms next on Sick, Sad World.
